name: IND_Generic Record Retention Date
description:
[farmas 11/23/2021]: Reviewed.

This datasource is designed to utilize four columns from the _UW_Retention_Mapping custom table to determine (in real time) the Record Retention Trigger Date of a document; Category, DocumentType, RecordType, and RetentionDateRule. The custom table contains a RetentionDateRule column that is mapped to a unique Category, DocumentType, and RecordType.
